In England, in the seven days to 22 January, there were 565,453 new confirmed cases (999.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 January, there were 548,238 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (17,215 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 January is 13,817,017 (24,433.2 cases per 100,000 population).
